content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I am glad to negotiate the rental price with you. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think 450 Euro per month would be a reasonable price for this apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is too low for this apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, how about 500 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is still too low for this apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, how about 550 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is still too low for this apartment. I am looking for a higher price. Please make a higher offer. 

Remember, if you want to terminate the negotiation, you can say 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
